"GlideSpike" - A combination of ultimate frisbee and ice skating where players wear special cleats that allow them glide the ice the ground while playing the game.
"BouncyBall" - A sport where players wear trampolines on their feet and have to dodge balls thrown by other players while bouncing around the court.
"FlyingFish" - A sport where players wear jetpacks and try to catch fish in the air while flying through the water.
"SkyDiveSoccer" - A sport where players play soccer in the sky using parachutes and jump out of an airplane the ground.
"RoboRumble" - A sport where teams of robots battle each other in an arena using various weapons and abilities.
